title: Chicken Parmagiana
ingredients: Minced fresh parsley or oregano leaves for garnish
directions: Set up three bolws: one with all-purpose floure, one with a beaten egg, and one with bread crumbs.
Sprinkle the chicken with salt and pepper.
Add oil and butter to the skillet. When it is hot, dredge a piece of chicken in the flour, then the egg, and then the bread crumbs. Add it to the pan.
Cook just enough to brown -- it will finish cooking in the oven.
Spread 1/2 cup of tomato sauce on the bottom of a baking dish. Add the chicken and cover with more sauce. Top with mozzarella.
Bake until the cheese melts. About 10 to 15 minutes.
Top with minced parsley or oregano.
